Coronavirus: Meal sites during West Contra Costa school closures announced
The school district will distribute meals between 11 a.m. and 1 p.m. Monday through Friday during the closures.
Mercury News • 3/16/2020
3-Week School Closure Begins; Election Day Prep Underway
A mandatory three-week closure of schools to stem the spread of the coronavirus began Monday, bars and restaurants were closed indefinitely, and the state continued preparations for Election Day Tuesday.
U.S. News & World Report • 3/16/2020
With Texas schools closed, support grows to delay or suspend STAAR tests
After a wave of requests, in a statement Saturday TEA said it would issue formal guidance by Thursday as changes are finalized.
Fort Worth Star-Telegram • 3/16/2020
Coronavirus: LAUSD schools start 2-week closure
Monday marks the first day without school for Los Angeles Unified School District students after mounting pressure and growing concern among parents, teachers and administrators due to the novel coronavirus. Nearly 900 campuses will be impacted by the closure, which was announced Friday and will last at least two weeks in an effort to prevent ...
ABC7 • 3/16/2020
Texas schools could be closed for remainder of year due to coronavirus concerns
While it remains unknown how long it'll be before students go back to school amid the coronavirus outbreak, the Texas Education Commissioner reportedly told superintendents and lawmakers to be prepared for long-term district closures. Commissioner Mike Morath said the closing could potentially run through the end of the school year, especially ...
abc13.com • 3/16/2020
Coronavirus: Douglas County Schools Feeding Students Throughout COVID-19 Closure
The Douglas County School System will continue feeding students while schools are closed in response to the Coronavirus threat. Beginning March 18, free meals will be available for children ages 0-18 at several Douglas County sites. Meals will be available for pickup at five locations: Alexander High School, Chapel Hill High School, Douglas ...
Patch • 3/16/2020
Coronavirus: education officials to discuss possible school closures in England
Education secretary likely to address concerns about GCSEs and A-levels amid calls to delay exams
The Guardian • 3/16/2020
Several districts offer free meals during school closure
SAN ANTONIO — Many school districts are providing meals to students while campuses are closed due to coronavirus concerns. Some of the districts are starting meal service Monday and others are starting Tuesday. Also, some of them require the children under 18 be present for the meal pickup. Please check with each district on the particular rules.
KENS • 3/16/2020
Louisiana Coronavirus Updates: 103 cases statewide, closed schools serving food
New Orleans Public Schools, charter schools and local agencies are working together to help feed school students during the prolonged school closure because of coronavirus concerns. The efforts have resulted in a city-wide child nutrition program starting March 23, but some school locations will become Community Feeding Locations open to anyone ...
WWLTV • 3/16/2020
South Carolina schools offering lunches to students during coronavirus closings
CHARLOTTE, N.C. — With all public schools in North Carolina and South Carolina closed for at least the next two weeks to prevent the spread of COVID-19, or novel coronavirus, millions of children will be impacted when it comes to having enough food to eat at home. To help ease some parents' concerns, districts in the Charlotte area in South ...
WCNC • 3/16/2020
Ghana closes schools, bans gatherings over coronavirus
Ghana on Monday closed all schools and universities and suspended public events to stop the spread of coronavirus as a string of African nations imposed tighter restrictions to stem the spread of the global pandemic. President Nana Akufo-Addo announced in an address to the west African nation that the authorities were shutting schools and ...
Medical Xpress • 3/16/2020
Schools close to contain coronavirus. Will it work? Depends on what we do with our kids.
Many schools around the United States have closed, potentially for weeks, to help stem the spread of coronavirus. If you — like us — have children at home, you are likely grappling with how to handle their being out of school. This is no ordinary snow day, and the measures we take now can have important implications for protecting our ...

Lafayette Parish students can pick up meals while schools are closed
Lafayette Parish students can pick up meals while schools are closed The grab-and-go breakfast and lunch pick-up service starts Tuesday. Are you affected by the coronavirus school closures in Alaska? Help us report the story.
Because of concerns about the spreading coronavirus, public schools across Alaska have been ordered closed to students through at least March 30. We’re reporting a story about impacts — the reasons, how families and others are coping with the disruptions, what’s next. We want your help. Please use the form below. We also want to hear from ...

Child Care, Meals Information During School Closures Due To Coronavirus
In response to an executive order from Gov. Walz regarding the novel coronavirus (COVID-19), District 196 has canceled school beginning Monday, March 16, until Monday, March 30. As stated in the previous message, school buildings will be open Monday, March 16 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. to allow students/families and staff to collect necessary items ...

Many Texas schools could be closed through academic year due to coronavirus, education commissioner warns
In separate calls with superintendents and lawmakers Sunday, Texas Education Commissioner Mike Morath said decisions on extended school closures would be left up to locals. by Aliyya Swaby March 15, 2020 5 hours ago The latest updates on coronavirus in Texas: The state is experiencing a public health disaster as community spread has been ...
Texas Tribune • 3/15/2020
Nevada schools, Wynn, MGM plan closures due to coronavirus concerns
LAS VEGAS (AP) — The new coronavirus is spurring Nevada schools and Wynn Las Vegas to plan closures. Nevada Gov. Steve Sisolak announced Sunday that all public, private and charter K-12 schools in the state will be closed Monday until at least April 6 in an effort to stop the spread of the coronavirus. The announcement came the same day Wynn ...

New York City schools to close Monday to fight coronavirus
sending over 1.1 million children home in hopes of curbing the spread of coronavirus, the city’s mayor announced Sunday. A somber Mayor Bill de Blasio announced the decision to close schools through at least April 20 — and possibly for the school year — as similar closures occurred in communities and entire states nationwide and pressure ...

Montebello Unified schools to shut for two weeks amid coronavirus concerns
In an emergency meeting Saturday, school board officials decided to close all 28 Montebello Unified schools, a district spokesman said in a statement. The closure comes just after the Los Angeles County Office of Education superintendent asked all school district boards to close down their campuses — that request means as many as 80 districts ...

Wisconsin parents left with questions, dilemmas after coronavirus prompts school closures
Wisconsin parents left with questions, dilemmas after coronavirus prompts school closures Parents worry about child care, working from home, remote learning and other questions raised by the recent closure of schools around the state. The mayor said there is a chance schools could remain closed for the rest of the school year. Full coverage of the coronavirus outbreak The announcement came after widespread calls to close the schools and protests from "furious" teachers who thought it was irresponsible to keep schools open. "It is time to take more dramatic measures," the ...

Coronavirus: Local schools to continue providing free or reduced-price meals
Coronavirus: Local schools to continue providing free or reduced-price meals Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine said Sunday that schools could be closed longer than three weeks to stem the spread of COVID-19. Coronavirus: NYC, Nassau and Suffolk schools to close Monday, Westchester likely later this week
Coronavirus: NYC, Nassau and Suffolk schools to close Monday, Westchester likely later this week Schools on Long Island will be closed for two weeks starting Monday, the 44 districts in Westchester are expected to close later in the week. Check out this story on DemocratandChronicle.com: https://www.lohud.com/story/news/health/2020/03/15/cuomo ...
Democrat and Chronicle • 3/15/2020
REPORT: S.C. governor to announce statewide school closures at coronavirus briefing at 4 p.m.
(Source: WBTV) WEST COLUMBIA, S.C. (WIS) - Gov. Henry McMaster will address the public Sunday afternoon with the latest on the state’s response to COVID-19, or the novel coronavirus. The Associated Press reported the governor will announce “temporary closures for schools across the state.” The governor will be joined by public health offi ...
WIS TV • 3/15/2020
School closures of 8 weeks or more? This is why the CDC says doing it could better mitigate coronavirus spread.
(CNN) -- Closing schools for eight weeks or more may have a greater impact on mitigating the spread of the novel coronavirus than two- to four-week closures, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has said. Further, short-term closures may actually have detrimental effects, negatively impacting older caregivers at home, the CDC said.
Click2Houston • 3/15/2020
Andover Schools Meal Program During Coronavirus Closure
Andover Public Schools are closing for two weeks to slow the spread of the new coronavirus. (Shutterstock) ANDOVER, MA — Andover Public Schools will provide boxed meals for students during its closure over the next two weeks,
Patch • 3/15/2020
North Andover School Meals Available During Coronavirus Closure
(Shutterstock) NORTH ANDOVER, MA — North Andover Public Schools plan to provide free grab-and-go meals during their closure over concerns about the new coronavirus. The district put out a survey asking families how they prefer to receive the meals: pick-up or delivery. Both breakfast and lunch will be available. The survey is available here.
Patch • 3/15/2020
Murphy says school closings ’imminent’ as New Jersey coronavirus cases rise to 98
Gov. Phil Murphy said Sunday that statewide school closures are "imminent," and that he is preparing to announce that decision on Monday, as the number of coronavirus cases in New Jersey nears 100. "With definitiveness, we will be prepared to lay out the statewide shutdown of schools tomorrow at our press briefing at 2 p.m.," Murphy said on a ...
Politico • 3/15/2020
Coronavirus outbreak: NYC teachers 'furious' over de Blasio's policy to keep schools open
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio started rebuffing any effort to close schools last week saying, “we are going to do our damnedest to keep the schools open.”
NBC News • 3/15/2020
Some Acadiana schools to offer meals during coronavirus closure; what we know
One of the most pressing questions concerning the month-long closure of K-12 schools in Louisiana due to the novel coronavirus is this: Will schools continue to provide lunch to students who rely on the meals?
The Advocate • 3/15/2020
